channel.title: Community on Donia Chaiehloudj
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Donia Chaiehloudj

item.title: eBPF Summit Hackathon Edition
item.description: Episode 199 where Liz Rice and I reveal the winners of the eBPF Summit Hackathon and discuss submission highlights with special guests.

item.title: Open Source Inclusion - Merge Forward Initiative
item.description: Discussing Merge Forward, an initiative focused on strengthening diversity and inclusion across open source communities, with Troy Connor at KubeCon NA 2025.

item.title: Merge Forward
item.description: Leading onsite KubeCon activities for the CNCF Merge Forward initiative, supporting underrepresented groups in open source.

item.title: Cilium's Honeycomb: Cultivating Technical Excellence in a Diverse Ecosystem
item.description: Sponsored keynote celebrating the collective intelligence behind Cilium’s success - diverse use cases, users, and contributors cultivating technical excellence.

item.title: Go, Community, and Learning
item.description: Discussing my diverse career journey, from image processing and electronics to Go development in the cloud-native space, community leadership, and balancing career with motherhood.

item.title: Behind the scenes of the GDG Sophia-Antipolis
item.description:

Follow me today in my event organisation throwback, and check the surprise at the end!

item.title: Behind the scenes of the GDG Sophia-Antipolis
item.description: A look behind the scenes of founding and running the Google Developer Group Sophia-Antipolis - building a tech community in the south of France.

item.title: Google Developer Group Sophia-Antipolis
item.description: Founded the GDG Sophia-Antipolis chapter in 2022. Since then, organized 30+ events including meetups and annual DevFest conferences.

item.title: WHAT06 - Women Hackers Action Tank
item.description: Active member of WHAT06 since 2021, contributing as MC for events, working on the Tech4Elles mentoring app, and hosting the WHAT06 podcast.
